EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_TM_Timesheet_Record__c.Project_Manager_Name__c},
{!ApprovalRequest.Process_Assignee} has requested for timesheet record your approval for the following item click here.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
